ithimr 0.1.1
  • Reference

Get values for max mode share scenario

get_scenario_settings.Rd

Computes the maximum mode share for specified mode types and specified distance categories across specified (stored) cities. Used for max mode share scenario generation.

get_scenario_settings(
  cities = c("accra", "bangalore", "belo_horizonte", "bogota", "buenos_aires",
    "cape_town", "delhi", "mexico_city", "santiago", "sao_paulo", "vizag"),
  modes = c("pedestrian", "cycle", "car", "motorcycle", "bus"),
  distances = c("0-2 km", "2-6 km", "6+ km"),
  speeds = list(bus = 11, bus_driver = 11, minibus = 11, minibus_driver = 11, car = 14,
    taxi = 9, pedestrian = 3, walk_to_pt = 3, cycle = 7, motorcycle = 14, truck = 11, van
    = 14, subway = 16, rail = 20, auto_rickshaw = 9, shared_auto = 14, shared_taxi = 9,
    cycle_rickshaw = 5)
)

Arguments

cities

which cities to use
modes

which modes to use
distances

which distance categories to use
speeds

named list of mode speeds (to be applied to all cities)

Value

data frame of proportions by mode and distance category

Contents
